scripts.build: mkdir -p ./public && cp index.html ./public/ && cp -r ../dist/web/images ./public/ && cp -r ../dist/web/ ./public/tokens && sass ./main.scss | postcss --use postcss-custom-properties --output ./public/main.css --map
scripts.dev: npm run build && serve ./public & nodemon --watch index.html --watch main.scss -x 'npm run build'
